Package Model

Class CoCitationDBCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.CoCitationDBCreator
  • public class CoCitationDBCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for extracting the reference-strings from the PDFs and extracting the metadata from the reference-strings. Then, it creates or extends a co-citation database with the extracted data. For doing so, multithreading is applied.
    Author:
    Benjamin Birner

    • Method Detail

      • splitPDF

        private void splitPDF​(java.lang.String pathPDFs)
               throws java.io.IOException
        This method splits each PDF file. It extracts the pages that contains the references and saves these pages as a new PDF document.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • referenceParser1

        private References[] referenceParser1​(java.lang.String pathPDFs)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        This method loads all PDF files and extracts the metadata from each reference of a publication. For each publication it creates one References object. A References object includes all references of a publication in shape of the corresponding number of Reference objects.
        Parameters:
        pathPDFs - the path to the folder that contains the PDF files
        Returns:
        A list that contains all References objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • referenceParser16

        private References[] referenceParser16​(java.lang.String pathPDFs)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This method loads all PDF files and extracts the metadata from each reference of a publication. For each publication it creates one References object. A References object includes all references of a publication in shape of the corresponding number of Reference objects. This Method uses multithreading with 16 Threads.
        Parameters:
        pathPDFs - the path to the folder that contains the PDF files
        Returns:
        A list that contains all References objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createDB

        public void createDB​(java.lang.String pathPDFs,
                     java.lang.String nameDB,
                     java.lang.String type)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This method extracts the metadata from the references of each publication and creates or extents a database with these data.
        Parameters:
        pathPDFs - the path to the folder that contains the PDF files
        nameDB - the name of the database
        type - specifies if a new database shall be created or an existing one shall be extended
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • registerShutdownHook

        private static void registerShutdownHook​(org.neo4j.dbms.api.DatabaseManagementService managementService)

      • storeDBName

        private void storeDBName​(java.lang.String name)
        This method stores the name of the database in the properties file
        Parameters:
        name - name of the database

      • manipulateTitle

        private java.lang.String manipulateTitle​(java.lang.String title)
        This method manipulates the title. It removes several signs from the title.
        Parameters:
        title - the title that should be manipulated
        Returns:
        the manipulated title
